payload.title: Test Cleanup - Eliminate Deprecation Warnings
payload.description: Clean up test suite by removing deprecated project-utils.test.ts file and fixing validator test mocking issues. Eliminate all console.warn DEPRECATED messages and ensure clean test output with proper TypeScript compilation.
payload.notes: Eliminated all deprecation warnings by removing project-utils.test.ts (functionality covered by config_manager.test.ts). Fixed validator test mocking issues with proper Object.defineProperty for errors. Clean test output: 284 tests passing, 0 warnings, 0 TypeScript errors.
